name: places/ChIJC8QntrpZwokRch6GnPWas3I
formattedAddress: 207 W 25th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 207 W 25th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: High-end furniture store with a selection of fine wood pieces, plus oriental rugs & home accents.

originalText.text: Everything about this experience was positive. I worked with Grace Murray who has a keen eye and is a wealth of information. During a pandemic when delivery times are exceptionally long, her honesty and willingness to go the extra mile was truly appreciated. She guided me during three trips to the store until I felt comfortable with my purchase. Grace tailored her advice to what I personally needed. Instead of being anxious, I finally got excited. She sent delivery men to do a "Survey" --   measurements to make sure pieces would fit in the elevator and through the door. This is a great service. We will wait longer than usual for delivery due to supply chain issues but so is the rest of the country. Visit Stickley Furniture/Mattress on West 25th Street. You will be treated well and their sales are amazing!

originalText.text:
Stickley is pricey. But you cannot beat their quality. Their furniture should last a lifetime and it has good resale value. I found a bed that i really liked that was being discontinued. I spoke to Barbara B on the phone who was so lovely and she  convinced me to come into the store. She really took the time to sit down with me and show me options (as the bed I really wanted was out of my price range) but she worked so hard and stayed a half hour late (which it seemed her boss was a bit annoyed with) She worked so hard in getting me all of the information which had been incorrect on the website! I finally decided to go with the more pricey bed because she was really lovely and convinced me that this bed would never cross my path again and in my heart I knew she was right! if you go to the this store, ask for Barbara.
Update: my bed has not arrived. I was originally told 20 weeks, then told end of September beginning of October- hurry up abd go buy your mattress as it takes 6 weeks. End of September I’m told by Stickley December or January and I was the one who called and asked about it. Very frustrating.

originalText.text:
Outstanding experience at Stickley.  Worked with Matthew Perreira on ordering a new bed today.  He was patient, extremely knowledgeable, and went out of his way to track down the bed in a facility upstate, which turned out to be discontinued and not easily available.  He was also an absolute pleasure to speak with, and full of helpful design advice -- he has a masters in furniture history and it shows! I would not hesitate to go back and work with him again.

Editing to add: Matthew was so excellent, and we liked the bed so much, that we went back two more times to find additional furniture for our bedroom.

originalText.text:
Customer service above an beyond...I was concerned about which stain to pick, knowing that the store studio lighting was much different from my home lighting, and the furniture would look completely different in another setting. A manager came to my home and showed me options and we came up with a design I was very happy with. I Bought two customized pieces in the Harvey Ellis line, and this upgrade was reasonable and everything I hoped it would be. The furniture is amazing. Extraordinarily well crafted. And even the delivery team was friendly and helpful. Setting things up exactly as I asked and seemed to take pride in their work as well.
Well done, Stickley!

originalText.text: I got rid of my television stand and an old couch and had room to purchase two couches. I looked at Stickley furniture and saw a lot of options. At this time, the Stickley stores were closed from the pandemic and had to rely on Ms. Abate as a liaison to walk me through pricing and options. With her help, I was able to settle on a leather Maitland sofa and a Cora Studio sofa. I had to wait until the stores were allowed to reopen, to select final options because there are a lot of options, like selecting the pattern of the pillows, and the choice of metal studs on the leather sofa. When I finally received the couches several months later, I was quite surprised about the quality. The leather was supple and the Cora sofa upholstery I selected in a burgundy/wine color made the living room come alive and was not at all garish. The salesman in Manhattan that I made the final selections with was professional and had a lot of patience. I don't know if I could buy all my furniture at Stickley because it's not inexpensive, but it's nice to have at least a few pieces of the best quality furniture that is high quality and will last for many years. Highly recommended!
